mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES (sales_date, client_no, title, emp_no, req_delivery_date, remarks) VALUES (#{sales_date}, #{client_no}, #{title}, #{emp_no}, #{req_delivery_date}, #{remarks})
INSERT INTO SALES_DETAILS (sales_date, client_no, product_no, quantity, price) VALUES (#{sales_date}, #{client_no}, #{product_no}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT client_no, client_name FROM CLIENTS WHERE client_type = 1
SELECT NVL(ph.price, 0) FROM PRODUCT p JOIN PRICE_HISTORY ph ON p.product_no = ph.product_no WHERE p.product_no = #{product_no} AND ph.sale_or_purchase = 1 AND ph.to_date = '99/12/31'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALES WHERE client_no = #{client_no} AND TO_DATE(sales_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{sales_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.sales_date || '_' || s.client_no) FROM SALES s LEFT JOIN CLIENTS c ON s.client_no = c.client_no LEFT JOIN SALES_DETAILS sd ON s.sales_date = sd.sales_date AND s.client_no = sd.client_no LEFT JOIN EMP e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE 1=1
AND s.sales_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND s.sales_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND LOWER(c.client_name) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{client_name} || '%')
AND s.status = #{status}

SELECT s.title, s.sales_date, e.emp_name, c.client_name, s.remarks, c.client_no, TO_CHAR(s.req_delivery_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS req_delivery_date, s.status FROM SALES s LEFT JOIN CLIENTS c ON s.client_no = c.client_no LEFT JOIN EMP e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE s.sales_date = #{sales_date} AND s.client_no = #{client_no}

SELECT p.product_name, sd.price, sd.quantity, sd.product_no, (sd.quantity * sd.price) AS totalPrice FROM SALES_DETAILS sd LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON sd.product_no = p.product_no WHERE sd.sales_date = #{sales_date} AND sd.client_no = #{client_no}
